text:
A thread 🧵

Canadians worried about #COVID19 #vaccine safety

@MoriartyLab & colleagues holding a special session

TODAY 5:30-7:30 ET to answer questions from LTC residents/caregivers

We will endeavour to answer questions in as many languages as possible

How to join? ⬇️ https://t.co/TEBDDo3Hg9
